abstract: Donald Trump, the larger-than-life real estate developer, and Carl C. Icahn, the activist investor, took their contentious fight for the Atlantic City hotel-casinos bearing Mr. Trump’s name to federal bankruptcy court, Reuters reported.
snippet: Donald Trump, the larger-than-life real estate developer, and Carl C. Icahn, the activist investor, took their contentious fight for the Atlantic City hotel-casinos bearing Mr. Trump’s name to federal bankruptcy court, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Donald Trump, the larger-than-life real estate developer, and Carl C. Icahn, the activist investor, took their contentious fight for the Atlantic City hotel-casinos bearing Mr. Trump’s name to U.S. bankruptcy court on Tuesday, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Icahn v. Trump: Casino Fight Heads to Court
